properties.areaDesc: Southeast Suffolk; Northern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk
properties.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 7 at 8:27AM EST until February 7 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph
with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Dense Fog Advisory,
visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog.

* WHERE...Northwestern Suffolk, Northeastern Suffolk,
Southwestern Suffolk, Southeastern Suffolk, Northern Nassau
and Southern Nassau Counties.

* WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from noon today to 7 PM EST
this evening. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 11 AM EST this
morning.

* IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines.
Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be
difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Hazardous
driving conditions due to low visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...|Travelers should be prepared for rapidly
changing visibilities, and slow down, and use low beams.
properties.instruction:
People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around
trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of
your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if
you must drive.

If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of
distance ahead of you.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
